includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep2 - The Man In The Outhouse

includedAssets.title: The Perfect Pieces In The Purple Pond
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep4 - The Perfect Pieces In The Purple Pond

includedAssets.title: The Crank In The Shaft

includedAssets.title: The He In The She
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep6 - The He In The She

includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep13 - Hero In The Hold

includedIn.title: Bones
includedIn.synopsis: Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance “Bones” Brennan joins forces with FBI special agent Seeley Booth to investigate murders where the only remnants of the victims are bones.
